responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: can it work in basic phone?
responses: It is a QR code or SMS string-based e-voucher, which is sent to the mobile of the beneficiaries.

This voucher works in a very secure and effienct way.For example, if the Government wants to cover a particular treatment of an employee in a specified hospital, it can issue an e-RUPI voucher for the determined amount through a partner bank.  The employee will receive an SMS or a QR Code on his feature phone / smart phone.  He/she can go to the specified hospital, avail of the services and pay through the e-RUPI voucher received on his phone.
e-RUPI is operable on basic phones also without any internet connection.

in e-RUPI, you will withdraw the digital currency and save it in your mobile wallet. When you make a transfer to an entity or to another person, the money moves from your digital wallet to theirs. There is no bank routing or intermediation.
